name: Dr.Crow
description:
Our young aspiring scientist Dr. Crow was at the verge of making a new scientific discovery in the field of space time continuum mechanics! But when a fatal mistake occurs mid the experiment It throws him into the forth Dimension, disrupting the time flow and universe! Now Dr. Crow is lost and needs to return immediately back to his world before time runs out and the multiverses cease to exist... Help Dr. Crow find the his way out using the time portals and his new found power! But be careful, cause “with great powers comes great responsibilities”.

Gameplay video
